alert.note: Alert for Greater Lake Tahoe Area (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 7:24PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHERN MONO AND ALPINE COUNTIES THROUGH 815 PM PDT... At 724 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ebbetts Pass, or 12 miles southwest of Topaz Lake, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Ebbetts Pass, Woodfords, Grover Hot Springs, Alpine Village, Markleeville, Junction CA 89 And CA 4, Monitor Pass, Turtle Rock Campground, Indian Creek Campground, Indian Creek Reservoir, and Alpine County Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
